title: CC
body: non ho trovato niente, ma per cc cosa significa?

replies.body:
Crowd control (commonly shortened to CC) is a blanket term used in League of Legends to describe abilities or spells that remove or diminish the control a target unit has over aspects of itself - aspects such as being able to cast spells or initiate movement commands. As crowd controls impact a unit's combat ability, they are essentially more specialized forms of debuffs - however, this ability to directly hinder a unit's ability to fight means that crowd controls are often given significantly more importance in regular gameplay than normal debuffs, resulting in their special classification.

There are many different forms of crowd control in League of Legends, each of which is unique in the way it affects its target and the ways it can - if at all - be resisted, mitigated or removed. Some crowd controls can be exclusive or near-exclusive to certain champions or items, and different champions can apply the same crowd control in multiple different ways. A few specific mechanics (such as Yasuo Last Breath) even require a catalyst crowd control to function.

9/10

Meglio di così c'è solo LetMeGoogleThatForYou
sono quelle skills che dovrebbero caratterizare i ruoli del jungler e del support
Invece i Mid/Top/Adc non hanno e/o non devono avere cc secondo il tuo ragionamento :D
